transcript: I'm amazed how many times in my life my response to self is great I'll do it again but better and how many times you can apply that to anything like great you learn the sales script front to back now do it again but better you can do it you know write the book you can do it for asking the gr you can do it for the product you can do it for the ux design you can do it for the email like great I do it again but better if you can keep doing that iteration without getting frustrated with it and seeing the character trait that you want to develop as the output of the activity rather than the thing that you're working on that I think is where you can get the W that no one can take away from you
